## R for confounding {.unnumbered}

The list of new R functions introduced in this *Confounding and bias* lab component are below:

|   Function name | Package name | Use | Chapters |
|   -------- | -------- | -------- | -------- |
| cmh.test	| lawstat	| To conduct the Mantel-Haenszel Chi-square test	| Collapsibility	|
| DAG.empty	| simcausal	| To initialize an empty DAG	| Confounding	|
| ftable	| base/stats	| To create a flat contingency table	| Collapsibility	|
| plotDAG	| simcausal	| To visualize a DAG	| Confounding	|
| set.DAG	| simcausal	| To create a DAG	| Confounding	|
| sim	| simcausal	| To simulate data using a DAG	| Confounding	|
